name: Retro Drop
description:
Retro Drop is an amazing adventure into a magical land made all retro shapes and color. Watch beautiful drops of retro shapes out of the sky. Tap on the shapes to collect them. But avoid hitting the bombs.

Ensure to tap as fast as you can, to ensure not to miss any retro shapes. Click on special item such as the x2 - to earn double the points, the snowflake to freeze and the no bombs icon to remove the bombs. The game is extremely addictive and will have you playing for hours on end.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Retro Drop!
